text: The Central Committee (CC) composition was elected by the 7th Congress, and sat from 8 March 1918 until 23 March 1919. The CC 1st Plenary Session renewed the composition of the Bureau, Secretariat and the Organizational Bureau (OB) of the Russian Communist Party (Bolsheviks). ==Keys== {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- | style="background: Pink" | | Indicates that the individual is female. |- | BY | Birth year. |- | DY | Death year. |- | PM | Party membership (when the individual joined the party). |- | B | Bureau member. |- | SC | Secretariat member. |- | OB | Orgburo member. |- | B(C) | The "(C)" refers to "Candidate member" |} ==Meetings== * Session of the Central Committee (8 March 1918) * Session of the Central Committee (15 March 1918) * Session of the Central Committee (30 March 1918) * Session of the Central Committee (31 March 1918) * Session of the Central Committee (31 March 1918) * Session of the Central Committee (4 April 1918) * Session of the Central Committee (7 April 1918) * Session of the Central Committee (26 April 1918) * Session of the Central Committee (3 May 1918) * Emergency session of the Central Committee (6 May 1918) * Session of the Central Committee (10 May 1918) * Session of the Central Committee (13 May 1918) * Session of the Central Committee (18 May 1918) * Session of the Central Committee (19 May 1918) * Session of the Central Committee (26 June 1918) * Session of the Central Committee (29 July 1918) * Session of the Central Committee (14 September 1918) * Session of the Central Committee (16 September 1918) * Session of the Central Committee (2 October 1918) * Session of the Central Committee (22 October 1918) * Session of the Central Committee (25 October 1918) * Session of the Central Committee (26 October 1918) * Session of the Central Committee (25 December 1918) * Session of the Central Committee (30 December 1918) * Session of the Central Committee (16 January 1919) * Session of the Central Committee (4 February 1919) * Session of the Central Committee (14 March 1919) * Evening session of the Central Committee (16 March 1919) * title: Central Committee elected by the 7th Congress of the Russian Communist Party (Bolsheviks)
